definition: to drip/to strain or filter/a trickle
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

sentences.english: The results of the test show that this pavement in Beijiang has a good durability of fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 北江橋採用改性瀝青鋪裝是成功的。

sentences.english: Being applicable at low temperatures it offers a suitable alternative to coal tar epoxy.
sentences.chinese: 低溫時，可作爲環氧煤焦瀝青漆的替代物。

sentences.english: They used pitch to cover roofs.
Steel chisel grassland, pitch surface ground or other soft ground.
sentences.chinese: 使用鋼釺在草地，瀝青地或其它鬆軟場地上固定篷房。

sentences.english: The construction technology and application of rubberized asphalt concrete are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 簡單介紹橡膠瀝青混凝土的施工工藝及應用。

sentences.english: It is worth popularizing as a new type undersurface layer gradation of asphalt pavement.
sentences.chinese: 是一種值得推廣的新型瀝青路面下面層級配。

sentences.english: Meso - carbon microbeads (MCMBs) were prepared from coal tar pitch by condensation.
sentences.chinese: 以煤瀝青爲原料，採用熱縮聚法制備中間相炭微球。

sentences.english: Multi-storey brick buildings, asphalt, lampposts, traffic signs.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有多層磚房，瀝青路，街燈，交通標誌。

sentences.english: In china, the micro-surfacing is mostly used to bituminous pavement and cement concrete deck at present.
sentences.chinese: 在我國，微表處目前大多用於瀝青路面和水泥砼橋面。

sentences.english: The new visbreaking process with de-oiled asphalt feedstock is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 論述了以脫油瀝青爲原料的減粘裂化新工藝。

sentences.english: The core wall of asphalt concrete with placement was applied to low clam.
sentences.chinese: 澆築式瀝青混凝土心牆多用於低壩，易於施工。

sentences.english: Coal tar bleed-through is likely with most topcoats.
sentences.chinese: 復塗以大部分面漆時，很可能發生瀝青滲色。

sentences.english: At last, we discussed aging mechanism of two asphalts.
sentences.chinese: 並對瀝青的老化機理了探討。

sentences.english: Results show that the recycling agent can heal the small fracture in asphalt road.
sentences.chinese: 再生養護劑可使瀝青路面上的細小裂縫基本癒合。

sentences.english: The modified coal tar pitches behaves in non-Newton fluid.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，改性煤瀝青摘要表現出非牛頓流體行爲。

sentences.english: Pitch concrete pavement with water-draining and noise-reducing functions.
sentences.chinese: 排水降噪瀝青混凝土路面。

definition: pipeline/general term for pipes, cables etc
to eliminate dust (i.e. filter out suspended particles)
